name: princesa-app
description: App da Princesa Ana Paula - Gerenciador de Tarefas e Rotinas

scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap copy android && npx cap sync android
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run serve" "npx cap run android --livereload"
scripts.build:apk: npm run android:build && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:release: npm run android:build && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease

author: Luiz Fernando
